Package game.gameactors.players

Class Bandit

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor
game.gameactors.players.Player
game.gameactors.players.Bandit
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, DeathRuneDroppper, Resettable, Respawnable
public class Bandit
extends Player
The Bandit class represents a player of the game who is a bandit. It extends the Player class and adds a GreatKnife weapon to the inventory.
See Also:
